GSD.product_version: versions from v4.18 to before v5.19.4
GSD.description:
mmc: meson-gx: Fix an error handling path in meson_mmc_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit d37c5f24d1c8693f25ed1934ed0ce429210aa3e2, it was introduced in version v4.18 by commit 19c6beaa064c4b198e7d774feab7a0851cf606a0. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mmc: meson-gx: Fix an error handling path in meson_mmc_probe()
